#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    
		int count=0,count1=0, l=0,b[1000]={0};
		char a[1000];
		cin>>a;
		l=strlen(a);
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++){
		   b[i]=a[i];
		}
		sort(b,b+l);

		for(int i=0;i<(l);i++)
		{
		while(b[i]==b[i+1])
		{
			i++;
			count++;
		}
		count++;
	    if(count%2==0){
            count1+=count/2;
	    }
	    else{
            count1+=count/2+1;
	    }

	    count=0;
	    }
	    cout<<count1<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
